models.brief_description: A deep learning framework for scRNA-seq clustering that integrates adversarial training with graph contrastive learning on GNNs to learn robust cell representations.
models.paper_title: scAGCL: a graph contrastive learning method with adversarial training to cluster scRNA-seq data

models.authors: Yongin Choi, Ruoxin Li, Gerald Quon
models.brief_description: An interpretable VAE that learns feature embeddings to enhance interpretation of latent dimensions, enabling identification of gene modules and hubs without explicit network inference.
models.paper_title: siVAE: interpretable deep generative models for single-cell transcriptomes

models.brief_description: A graph-based contrastive learning approach using prototypical representations for cell type identification in scRNA-seq data.
models.paper_title: scGPCL: graph prototypical contrastive learning for single-cell RNA-seq clustering

models.authors: Sheng Fang, Xiaokang Yu, et al.
models.brief_description: A contrastive learning framework that focuses on hard sample mining with ZINB-based loss for improved scRNA-seq clustering performance.
models.paper_title: scHSC: enhancing single-cell RNA-seq clustering via hard sample contrastive learning

models.brief_description: A simplified graph contrastive learning approach for single-cell clustering that removes complex augmentation strategies.
models.paper_title: scSimGCL: a simple graph contrastive learning method for single-cell RNA-seq clustering

models.brief_description: A latent diffusion model combined with VAE for generating realistic single-cell gene expression data and data augmentation.
models.paper_title: scDiffusion: conditional generation of high-quality single-cell data using diffusion model

models.full_name: Single-cell data integration with Variational Autoencoder
models.brief_description: A VAE-based method for integrating heterogeneous scRNA-seq datasets across batches while preserving biological variation.
models.paper_title: Online single-cell data integration through projecting heterogeneous datasets into a common cell-embedding space

models.full_name: Cell Basic Local Alignment Search Tool
models.brief_description: A neural network-based cell querying method using VAE for unbiased cell embedding, enabling efficient annotation and identification of novel cell types.
models.paper_title: Searching large-scale scRNA-seq databases via unbiased cell embedding with Cell BLAST

models.brief_description: A GM-VAE approach supporting multiple geometric distributions (Euclidean, Poincaré, PGM, LearnablePGM, HW) for patient-level analysis of single-cell disease atlases.
models.paper_title: PILOT-GM-VAE: patient-level analysis of single-cell disease atlas with optimal transport of Gaussian mixture variational autoencoders

models.brief_description: A graph neural network framework that formulates relationships between cells using cell-cell graphs and leverages autoencoders with LTMG for imputation and clustering.
models.paper_title: scGNN is a novel graph neural network framework for single-cell RNA-Seq analyses

models.authors: Sijing An, Jinhui Shi, et al.
models.brief_description: A deep learning model that couples Autoencoder with Dirichlet Process Mixture Model for adaptive clustering with automatic cluster number determination.
models.paper_title: scDAC: deep adaptive clustering of single-cell transcriptomic data with coupled autoencoder and Dirichlet process mixture model

models.brief_description: A deep learning approach combining autoencoders with DEC-style clustering for unsupervised cell type identification in scRNA-seq data.
models.paper_title: Clustering single-cell RNA-seq data with a model-based deep learning approach

models.brief_description: A hyperbolic VAE that embeds scRNA-seq data in Poincaré space to preserve hierarchical cell relationships for visualization and analysis.
models.paper_title: scDHMap: hyperbolic variational autoencoder for single-cell transcriptomics embedding

models.authors: Tian SW, Ni JC, et al.
models.brief_description: A graph contrastive clustering framework using graph attention networks with neighborhood augmentations for scRNA-seq data analysis.
models.paper_title: scGCC: Graph Contrastive Clustering With Neighborhood Augmentations for scRNA-Seq Data Analysis
models.journal: IEEE Journal of Biomedical and Health Informatics

models.authors: Xiaoxu Cui, Renkai Wu, et al.
models.brief_description: A deep learning method using ResNet-based convolutional autoencoders with attention mechanisms for accurate single-cell clustering.
models.paper_title: scSMD: a deep learning method for accurate clustering of single cells based on auto-encoder

models.authors: Wenkai Han, Yuqi Cheng, et al.
models.brief_description: A self-supervised contrastive learning framework for scRNA-seq data representation that handles batch effects and dropout events simultaneously.
models.paper_title: Self-supervised contrastive learning for integrative single cell RNA-seq data analysis
